EmailTemplate.name: How To Create a CERS User Account
EmailTemplate.subject: How to Create and Activate a New CERS Business User Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
How to Create and Activate a New CERS Business User Account:
Open your web browser and navigate to the CERS Central page. (http://cers.calepa.ca.gov) Select the “Business Portal Sign In” link from the top of the CERS Central page. Select the “Create New Account” button, located below the “New to CERS?” section of the CERS Business Sign In page. After completing the web form, select the “Create My Account” button. You will then receive an e-mail notification, from CERS, containing an Account Activation Link. Open the link provided in the e-mail message to activate your CERS Business user account. Once your account has been activated, you can then return to the CERS Business Sign In page and sign-in to CERS Business, using your username and password.
